intro.dialogue: Flowers? Check. Those cheesy heart shaped boxes filled with chocolates you see in every romance movie? Check. Looks like I've got everything for my date with Vanessa.
I still have no idea how I banked the hottest chick in class, but I'm definitally not complaining. Her long hair, her beautiful eyes and her very big, firm  and well rounded...
Personality.
To think she is waiting in the park for me just up ahead. Man am I nervous. I've been crushing on her ever since the start of the year.
I absolutely, without a doubt, can't afford to screw this up. I need her to think I'm cool and laid back. Not some stinky basement dweller playing games all day.
I mean, I am, but she doesn't know that yet so I might actually have a chance.
Alright, just gotta check the time and- OH NO I AM RUNNING LATE!
Oh man I'm running late! I guess internally monologing does take up a lot of time. I better get going and fast!
I just have to walk up these stairs
It will be a breeze, just a few more steps and-
Oh no, I misstepped and I can't reach the railing! Man this is going to hurt!
Ah man my head feels like it's about to burst. I can barely stand up.
Hold up a second. Where am I? This doesn't look anything like the park. What happened? I was walking up the stairs a minute ago!
Okay lets recap. I fell down the stairs, blacked out, woke up and now I'm here. There is only 1 logical explanation.
Alien. Abduction.
They made me trip, picked me up in their spaceship, harvested my organs and dropped me back here.
Wait, no. I still have my organs. But how did I get here? It doesn't feel like I was out for long.
Hello there, little fellow
A bird? A speaking bird? Since when can birds speak?
My my, such an odd creature! I've never seen anyone like you before?
What are you?
I think it's better if you ask me WHO I am. The name's Corvo. I brought you here to fulfill your destiny!
What destiny? My destiny was to have a date with my smoking hot friend!
Do you really think Vanessa would have wanted to go out with such a sad little loser like you? You've got no dating experience!
Fwie fwie fwie fwie! Don't make me laugh! But not to fear because I am here! I will guide you and make sure you ace your dates in no time!
What? What dates? I just want to go on my date with Vanessa!
You see, this area is filled with cute bachelors and bachelorettes looking for love. You should practice romancing them.
If you do that succesfully, you might have a shot with Vanessa. fwie fwie fwie.
How do I do that?
Talk to them, my little fellow, make yourself out to be interesting, give them compliments to increase their love meter
Be warned though, answering questions wrong will make the lovemeter go down.
I think it's time to send you out to the wild now, you can do it little fellow. Or not. fwie fwie fwie.
Regardless, I'll help you if you mess up.
